eidith

The eidith R package provides programmatic access and analytical tools for data from the http://www.vetmed.ucdavis.edu/ohi/predict/, housed at the https://www.eidith.org/.

Details

The eidith package contains no data. To access data, you must be https://www.eidith.org/register.aspx EIDITH user with data access privileges.

Topics

  • Authentication with EIDITH credentials
  • Downloading EIDITH data to a local store and direct API access
  • Data cleaning
  • Metadata for tables and fields in the EIDITH database

Contact

  • Package source code is found at https://github.com/ecohealthalliance/eidith
  • File bug reports and request features at https://github.com/ecohealthalliance/eidith/issues
  • Online version of this documentation found at https://ecohealthalliance.github.io/eidith/
  • Questions related to your EIDITH credentials should be directed to mailto:technology@eidith.org.
